Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
@ResoluteCrypto https://www.npmjs.com/package/electron-native-notification is legit (atleast not malicious) the one that was used to attack agama was `electron-native-notify` notice "notification vs notify"
```
https://www.npmjs.com/package/electron-native-notify was the malicious one
https://snyk.io/vuln/npm:electron-native-notify
```
